title: Men's Classic Denim Jacket
description: Crafted from durable denim, this classic jacket features a button-up front, adjustable cuffs, and spacious pockets. A staple for any casual outfit, it pairs well with jeans or chinos for a timeless look.

title: Wireless Bluetooth Headphones
description: Experience high-quality sound with these over-ear Bluetooth headphones. Featuring active noise cancellation, comfortable ear cushions, and up to 40 hours of battery life, they’re perfect for work, travel, or relaxation.

title: Camping Sleeping Bag
description: This all-season sleeping bag is designed for maximum warmth and comfort. It's lightweight, water-resistant, and easy to roll up and carry, making it ideal for camping, hiking, or emergency preparedness.

title: Organic Rolled Oats - 1kg
description: Start your day right with these organic, gluten-free rolled oats. Rich in fiber and protein, they’re perfect for making oatmeal, smoothies, granola, or baked goods. Grown without pesticides or additives.

title: Women's Cotton T-Shirt
description: This soft, breathable t-shirt is made from 100% premium cotton and features a relaxed fit, crew neckline, and reinforced stitching. Ideal for everyday wear or layering under jackets and cardigans.

title: Smartphone Tripod with Remote
description: Capture steady shots and smooth videos with this compact smartphone tripod. It features adjustable legs, a 360° swivel mount, and a Bluetooth remote for hands-free photo and video control.

title: Stainless Steel Water Bottle - 750ml
description: Stay hydrated with this double-wall insulated stainless steel water bottle. It keeps drinks cold for up to 24 hours and hot for 12, with a leak-proof lid and sweat-free finish for easy handling.

title: Whole Grain Brown Rice - 2kg
description: Packed with essential nutrients, this whole grain brown rice is a healthy alternative to white rice. Its slightly nutty flavor and firm texture make it great for stir-fries, salads, and bowls.

title: Men's Running Shoes
description: Engineered for performance and comfort, these men's running shoes feature breathable mesh uppers, cushioned soles, and excellent grip. Ideal for running, walking, or all-day wear.

title: LED Flashlight - Waterproof
description: Reliable and compact, this waterproof LED flashlight offers multiple light modes and powerful brightness for outdoor use. Perfect for camping, emergencies, or keeping in your car or bag.

title: Men's Waterproof Hiking Boots
description: Built for rugged terrain, these hiking boots feature a waterproof exterior, cushioned insole, and reinforced toe for durability and comfort during long treks.

title: Portable Solar Power Bank - 20,000mAh
description: Charge your devices anywhere with this solar-powered bank. It features dual USB ports, LED light, and a rugged design perfect for travel and emergencies.

title: 4-Person Pop-Up Camping Tent
description: This easy-setup tent comfortably fits up to 4 people. It features weather-resistant materials, mesh ventilation windows, and a zippered door for privacy and airflow.

title: Natural Peanut Butter - 500g
description: Made from 100% roasted peanuts with no added sugar or oil, this creamy peanut butter is a protein-rich spread perfect for toast, smoothies, or baking.

title: Women's Lightweight Jogger Pants
description: These jogger pants combine style and comfort with their tapered fit, elastic waistband, and breathable fabric. Ideal for casual wear, workouts, or lounging.

title: USB-C Multiport Adapter Hub
description: Expand your laptop’s capabilities with this 6-in-1 USB-C hub, including HDMI, USB 3.0 ports, SD card reader, and power delivery for efficient multitasking.

title: Foldable Camping Chair with Cup Holder
description: Relax outdoors with this foldable chair featuring a durable steel frame, comfortable armrests, and a built-in cup holder. Great for camping, sports, and beach trips.

title: Organic Extra Virgin Olive Oil - 1L
description: Cold-pressed and rich in antioxidants, this organic extra virgin olive oil is perfect for salads, sautéing, or dipping. A heart-healthy pantry essential.

title: Unisex Fleece Zip-Up Hoodie
description: Stay warm and stylish with this ultra-soft fleece hoodie. It features a full zip, drawstring hood, and front pockets for added warmth and convenience.

title: Cruncy Oat Granola Cereal - 750g
description: A hearty breakfast mix of rolled oats, almonds, raisins, and dried cranberries. This granola is packed with nutrients and lightly sweetened with honey.
